versionTitle: Jewish Environmentalism: An Ancient Value Source Sheet, by Adam Rossano, To whom does the world belong and what is our relation to it? - The environmentalist imperative in the Midrash
title: Kohelet Rabbah
text: At the time that the Holy One created the first man, He introduced him to every tree in the Garden of Eden, and said to him, ‘See how wonderful and pleasant these trees are. And all of this I have created for you; therefore take great care that you do not damage and destroy My world, for if you do there is no one else to put right what you have destroyed.’
